body_html:
Issue 2 is a documentation issue. We only have one type of decoder right now so we just need to change it to something like "an object containing the decoder output". PRs welcome.

Issue 1 - we're not really focusing on that attention wrapper (i would like to mark it deprecated). We have a more comprehensive attention wrapper in tf.contrib.seq2seq.AttentionWrapper. In the meantime, PRs changing the variable name inside that function are welcome.
body_text:
Issue 2 is a documentation issue.  We only have one type of decoder right now so we just need to change it to something like "an object containing the decoder output".  PRs welcome.
Issue 1 - we're not really focusing on that attention wrapper (i would like to mark it deprecated).  We have a more comprehensive attention wrapper in tf.contrib.seq2seq.AttentionWrapper.  In the meantime, PRs changing the variable name inside that function are welcome.
body:
Issue 2 is a documentation issue.  We only have one type of decoder right now so we just need to change it to something like "an object containing the decoder output".  PRs welcome.

Issue 1 - we're not really focusing on that attention wrapper (i would like to mark it deprecated).  We have a more comprehensive attention wrapper in tf.contrib.seq2seq.AttentionWrapper.  In the meantime, PRs changing the variable name inside that function are welcome.
